insert.if: INSERT INTO pay_comm_party(PARTYID, PARTYTYPE, PARTYNAME, PARTYALIAS, PARTYSTATUS, STATUS, CONTACT, TELEPHONE, MAIL, FAX, EFFECTDATE, INEFFECTIVEDATE, CHANGENUMBER, CHANGECIRCLETIMES, LASTUPDATE, LASTUPTIME ) VALUE ( #{partyID}, #{partyType}, #{partyName}, #{partyAlias}, #{partyStatus}, #{status}, #{contact}, #{telephone}, #{mail}, #{fax}, #{effectDate}, #{inEffectiveDate}, #{changeNumber}, #{changeCircleTimes}, #{lastUpDate}, #{lastUpTime} )

mapper.update: UPDATE pay_comm_party SET PARTYTYPE = #{partyType}, PARTYNAME = #{partyName}, PARTYALIAS = #{partyAlias}, PARTYSTATUS = #{partyStatus}, CONTACT = #{contact}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone}, MAIL = #{mail}, FAX = #{fax}, STATUS = #{status}, EFFECTDATE = #{effectDate}, INEFFECTIVEDATE = #{inEffectiveDate}, CHANGENUMBER = #{changeNumber}, CHANGECIRCLETIMES = #{changeCircleTimes}, LASTUPDATE = #{lastUpDate}, LASTUPTIME = #{lastUpTime} WHERE PARTYID = #{partyID}
mapper.select:
SELECT P.PARTYID partyID, P.PARTYTYPE partyType, P.PARTYNAME partyName, P.PARTYALIAS partyAlias, P.PARTYSTATUS partyStatus, P.STATUS status, P.CONTACT contact, P.TELEPHONE telephone, P.MAIL mail, P.FAX fax, P.EFFECTDATE effectDate, P.INEFFECTIVEDATE inEffectiveDate, P.CHANGENUMBER changeNumber, P.CHANGECIRCLETIMES changeCircleTimes, P.LASTUPDATE lastUpDate, P.LASTUPTIME lastUpTime FROM pay_comm_party P
P.PARTYID = #{partyID}

SELECT P.PARTYID partyID, P.PARTYTYPE partyType, P.PARTYNAME partyName, P.PARTYALIAS partyAlias, P.PARTYSTATUS partyStatus, P.STATUS status, P.CONTACT contact, P.TELEPHONE telephone, P.MAIL mail, P.FAX fax, P.EFFECTDATE effectDate, P.INEFFECTIVEDATE inEffectiveDate, P.CHANGENUMBER changeNumber, P.CHANGECIRCLETIMES changeCircleTimes, P.LASTUPDATE lastUpDate, P.LASTUPTIME lastUpTime FROM pay_comm_party P WHERE P.INEFFECTIVEDATE < #{inEffectiveDate};
